name: Morph
description:
Create awesome effects like Skeuomorph, Neon, Glitch, Reflection, Glass, Gradient, etc. right in Figma!


Support the plugin: buy me a coffee


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


One-click transform

Just select any shape, vector, or text layer, pick a morph effect from the plugin and boom!


Adjust effects with ease

Play around with the properties and adjust effects with ease to get the desired result.


Mix and Match

Use a combination of different morph effects and create something unique or artistic.


100% Free

All the effects are absolutely free to use. No registration required either.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Have suggestions, bug report, or wish to have an effect of your choice, ping me -> Twitter


Unleash your creativity with Morph! I'd be very thankful for spreading the word on social media or tagging me.
